reviews.title: From Gangnam Style to Gentleman Style!
reviews.comment: Dance like Psy to the tunes of his new monster hit Gentleman. Collect combos and hopefully gain a new high score. If you like Psy or K-pop in general, this is the game for you.
reviews.author: Andreas Almkvist

reviews.title: Awesome PSY game!
reviews.comment: Very addictive quality game with some cool in-app upgrades. Graphics is very awesum and the mother-father-gentleman track is stomping!
reviews.author: Joel Ricci
